blogPost.excerpt: Job Description is an AI-based service utilising GPT-3 to generate high-quality professional job descriptions for businesses attracting the best talent. Generate professional job descriptions in seconds. No previous writing experience required.
blogPost.body: Job Description is an AI-based service utilising GPT-3 to generate high-quality professional job descriptions for businesses attracting the best talent. Generate professional job descriptions in seconds. No previous writing experience required.
blogPost.title: Job Description AI - Create professional job descriptions in seconds using AI
blogPost.author: Oras Al-Kubaisi

localize.description: 职位描述是一个基于人工智能的服务，利用GPT-3生成高质量的专业职位描述，为企业吸引优秀人才。几秒钟就能生成专业的职位描述。无需以往的写作经验。
localize.tagline: 使用AI在几秒钟内创建专业的工作描述

localize.description: 職位描述是一個基於人工智能的服務，利用GPT-3生成高質量的專業職位描述，爲企業吸引優秀人才。幾秒鐘就能生成專業的職位描述。無需以往的寫作經驗。
localize.tagline: 使用AI在幾秒鐘內創建專業的工作描述

previous.excerpt: Create awesome effects like skeuomorph, neon, glitch, glass, and more - right in Figma! One-click transforms, adjust properties with ease, mix & match. Go creative! Available for free in the Figma community.
previous.title: Morph Plugin for Figma - Create awesome effects right in Figma

localize.description: 在Figma中创建超棒的效果，如Skeuomorph、霓虹灯、闪光、玻璃等--就在Figma中！一键变换，轻松调整属性，混合匹配。一键转换，轻松调整属性，混合和匹配。发挥创意吧 可在 Figma 社区免费使用。
localize.tagline: 在Figma中直接创建超棒的效果

localize.description: 在Figma中創建超棒的效果，如Skeuomorph、霓虹燈、閃光、玻璃等--就在Figma中！一鍵變換，輕鬆調整屬性，混合匹配。一鍵轉換，輕鬆調整屬性，混合和匹配。發揮創意吧 可在 Figma 社區免費使用。
localize.tagline: 在Figma中直接創建超棒的效果

next.excerpt: Let's build an alternative option for the traditional career & city life. One closer connected to nature, yourself and others. Discover 30+ places around the world where you can live, work and surf with like-minded remote workers. Cuz life is now. Pier🌺️
next.title: Coworksurf - Coliving spaces and 👩‍💻  communities next to the surf 🌊

localize.description: 让我们为传统的职业和城市生活打造一个另类选择。一个与自然、自己和他人更紧密联系的选择。探索全球30多个地方，在那里你可以和志同道合的远程工作者一起生活、工作和冲浪。因为生活就是现在。Pier🌺️ 🌺️
localize.tagline: 栖息地和邻近冲浪的社区💻🌊。

localize.description: 讓我們爲傳統的職業和城市生活打造一個另類選擇。一個與自然、自己和他人更緊密聯繫的選擇。探索全球30多個地方，在那裏你可以和志同道合的遠程工作者一起生活、工作和衝浪。因爲生活就是現在。Pier🌺️ 🌺️
